title: Social Democrats (Denmark)
summary: The Social Democrats (Danish: Socialdemokraterne, pronounced [soˈɕɛˀlte̝moˌkʰʁɑˀtɐnə]), officially the Social Democratic Party or simply Social Democracy (Danish: Socialdemokraterne, pronounced [soˈɕɛˀlte̝moˌkʰʁɑˀtɐnə]), is a social-democratic political party in Denmark.[2][7] A member of the Party of European Socialists (PES), the Social Democrats have 49 of 179 members of the Folketing and three (out of fourteen) MEPs.
